section.name: Jackcess
section.p: Jackcess ia a pure Java library for reading from and writing to MS Access databases. It is not an application. There is no GUI. It's a library, intended for other developers to use to build Java applications. Jackcess is licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License. Take a look at our Frequently Asked Questions for more info.

ul.li: Displaying the contents of a table: System.out.println(Database.open(new File("my.mdb")).getTable("MyTable").display());
Copying the contents of a CSV file into a new table: Database.open(new File("my.mdb")).importFile("Imported2", new File("my.csv"), ",");
